bibl.title: Lexicon of Eponym Dies on Rhodian Amphora Stamps. Volume 1. Eponyms Α
bibl.publisher: Centre d'Études Alexandrines (Diffusion: de Boccard, Paris)
bibl.note: Pp. 10-16, 3 figg. n./bl. et coul.: Jean-Yves Empereur, The Alexandrian Publication of Stamp Matrices on Hellenistic Amphora Handles; - 17-27, 1 tabl., 5 figg. n./bl. et coul.: G.C.-Ş., Introduction (A brief history of amphora stamp studies; - Amphora production on Rhodes and Rhodian amphora stamps; - The Alexandrian collections; - Definition of matrices; - Future projects dealing with the dies of stamps). - The database on line < http://www.amphoralex.org > includes (May 25th, 2015) 5,771 matrices of 258 Rhodian eponyms and 3,912 matrices of 387 Rhodian fabricants. The printed version presents the dies in the alphabetical order of the eponyms. Volume 1 covers the letter A; 3 more volumes will be published (Β to Κ, Λ to Σ and Τ to Χ).
tabl., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul.
bibl.seg: Gonca Cancardeş-Şenol, Lexicon of Eponym Dies on Rhodian Amphora Stamps. Volume 1. Eponyms Α = Études alexandrines. 33 = AmphorAlex. 3.
Alexandrie, Centre d'Études Alexandrines (Diffusion: de Boccard, Paris), 2015, 4°, 608 pp., tabl., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-2-11-139022-5. €40.

Pp. 10-16, 3 figg. n./bl. et coul.: Jean-Yves Empereur, The Alexandrian Publication of Stamp Matrices on Hellenistic Amphora Handles; - 17-27, 1 tabl., 5 figg. n./bl. et coul.: G.C.-Ş., Introduction (A brief history of amphora stamp studies; - Amphora production on Rhodes and Rhodian amphora stamps; - The Alexandrian collections; - Definition of matrices; - Future projects dealing with the dies of stamps). - The database on line < http://www.amphoralex.org > includes (May 25th, 2015) 5,771 matrices of 258 Rhodian eponyms and 3,912 matrices of 387 Rhodian fabricants. The printed version presents the dies in the alphabetical order of the eponyms. Volume 1 covers the letter A; 3 more volumes will be published (Β to Κ, Λ to Σ and Τ to Χ).
